sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Career() { return (
{/* Background gradient */}
{/* End background gradient */}
{/* Section header */}

Explore roles at Appy’s offices around the world

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est.

{/* Section content */}
{/* Job categories */}
{/* 1st job item */}

Development

4 Positions
 {/* 2nd job item */}

Product & Design

10 Positions
 {/* 3rd job item */}

Marketing

2 Positions
 {/* 4th job item */}

Data Science

4 Positions
 {/* 5th job item */}

Internal Systems

0 Positions
 {/* 6th job item */}

Administrative

0 Positions
{/* Locations links */}

Locations

  • All locations (44)
  • London, UK (14)
  • Milan, Italy (22)
  • New York, NYC (4)
  • Berlin, DE (12)
); } export default Career;
